item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the Magic Girls guild about page. We’re the Magic Girls. The Magic Girls is a social-oriented guild mostly centered around the various games we all play. Rules (18+) We are not babysitters. Keep the heated political arguments and religious discussions to DMs. No arguing about Metric vs. Imperial units. Respect everyone. Do not grief fellow Magic Girls. Drop any drama. Extremism and discrimination will bypass normal punishment and be met with a ban, block, and report.

item.title: Other Games
item.description: We play lots of things. Here is a taste of the other games you’ll find the Magic Girls playing: League of Legends Overwatch Minecraft Apex Legends Paladins Diablo
